name: buddyforms
description: Contact Forms, Post Forms for User Generated Content and Registration Forms easily build in minutes. Ideal for User Submitted Posts. Extendable with Addons!
author: ThemeKraft Team.

scripts.build: npm run css-build && npm run custom-prefix-buddyforms && npm run custom-prefix-cleancss-buddyforms && npm run custom-prefix-sourcemap-buddyforms && npm run custom-prefix-buddyforms-editor && npm run custom-prefix-cleancss-buddyforms-editor
scripts.css-build: node-sass --output-style expanded --no-source-map -r scss -o assets && npm run custom-prefix-buddyforms && npm run custom-prefix-buddyforms-editor && npm run custom-prefix-user-satisfaction
